News_Titles: On Daur Kove's meeting with Mikhail Galperin, Russian Federation Commissioner to the ECHR, Deputy Minister of Justice of the Russian Federation
News_Shorts: On February 11 within the framework of the working visit, Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia had a meetimg with Mikhail Galperin, the Commissioner of the Russian Federation at the European Court of Human Rights, Deputy Minister of Justice of the Russian Federation in Moscow in the Ministry of Justice of the Russian Federation.

News_Titles: Daur Kove took part in the opening ceremony of an international conference in Syria
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia took part in the opening ceremony of an international conference to facilitate the return of the Syrian refugees and internally displaced persons who were forced to leave Syria as a result of the conflict.

News_Titles: On the meeting with the Chairman of the Council of Ministers of the SAR Hussein Arnus
News_Shorts: On October 5, in Damascus, a meeting of the delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia, led by Alkhas Kvitsinia, with the Chairman of the Council of Ministers of the Syrian Arab Republic Hussein Arnus took place.

News_Titles: Daur Kove and Walid al Muallem signed an Agreement between the Government of the Republic of Abkhazia and the Government of the Syrian Arab Republic
News_Shorts: On October 5, the Abkhazian delegation headed by Alkhas Kvitsinia met with the Deputy Chairman of the Council of Ministers, Minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates Walid al Muallem at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of the Syrian Arab Republic.

News_Titles: President of the Syrian Arab Republic Bashar al-Assad received the delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia led by Alkhas Kvitsinia.
News_Shorts: On October 5, the President of the Syrian Arab Republic Bashar al-Assad received the delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia, headed by Alkhas Kvitsinia at the residence of the President of Syria in Damascus.

News_Titles: About the meeting of Daur Kove with Daniel Ortega, the President of Nicaragua
News_Shorts: On July 20, 2019 the meeting between Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia and Daniel Ortega, the President of the Republic of Nicaragua was held in Managua as part of the celebrations devoted to the 40th anniversary of the Sandinista revolution.

News_Titles: The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia arrived in the Republic of Nicaragua
News_Shorts: On July 18, 2019 the Delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia arrived with a working visit to the Republic of Nicaragua to participate in the commemoration of the 40th anniversary of the Sandinista revolution.

News_Titles: A meeting of the delegations of Abkhazia and Syria held at the international economic forum
News_Shorts: The work of the V-th Yalta International Economic Forum continues.

News_Titles: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia participates in the V-th anniversary international economic forum
News_Shorts: The V-th anniversary Yalta International Economic Forum «WORLD. RUSSIA. CRIMEA. NEW WORLD REALITY» takes place in Crimea from April 18 to April 20,2019. The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia is represented by Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Adgur Ardzinba, the Minister of Economy and the deputies of the Parliament-National Assembly.

News_Titles: Daur Kove, the Foreign Minister spoke at the IV-th Yalta International Economic Forum
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Foreign Minister spoke at the IV-th Yalta International Economic Forum (YIEF).

News_Titles: Daur Kove, the Foreign Minister of Abkhazia met with the delegation from Syria on the margins of the YIEF 2018
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia and Adgur Ardzinba, the Minister of Economy of the Republic of Abkhazia met with the delegation from Syria on the margins of the 4-th Yalta International Economic Forum (YIEF) on April 20.

News_Titles: On the meeting of Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with the President of the Republic of Nauru
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs met with Baron Divavesi Waqa, the President of the Republic of Nauru on January 26. The meeting was attended by Said Kharazia, the Deputy Speaker of the Parliament of the Republic of Abkhazia and Artur Gaguliya, the Head of the Department for Interaction with International Organizations

News_Titles: The Delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia arrived with the official visit to the Republic of Nauru.
News_Shorts: The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia led by Daur Kove, the Foreign Minister arrived to the Republic of Nauru with the official visit on January 26.

News_Titles: Daur Kove took part in the international conference in Israel
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia participated in the international round table "Status of the unrecognized states and their relations with Israel" which took place in Tel Aviv University on 8 November, 2017.

News_Titles: On the Visit of the Delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia took part in the festive events dedicated to the 27th anniversary of the formation of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: On the Visit of the Delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia officially visited the Republic of South Ossetia these days. The visit of the Abkhaz delegation is coincided with the 27th anniversary of the formation of the Republic of South Ossetia.

News_Titles: On the meeting with Bako Sahakyan, the President of the Republic of Artsakh
News_Shorts: The delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia was met by Bako Sahakyan, the President of the Republic of Artsakh on 28th of August.

News_Titles: The Abkhazian Foreign Ministry delegation met with Araik Harutyunyan
News_Shorts: The Abkhazian Foreign Ministry delegation met with Araik Harutyunyan, the Prime Minister of the Republic of Artsakh.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Ashot Gulyan, the Chairman of the National Assembly of the Republic of Artsakh
News_Shorts: Daur Kove the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Ashot Gulyan, the Chairman of the National Assembly of the Republic of Artsakh on August 28, within the framework of the visit of the delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Republic of Artsakh.

News_Titles: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Republic of Artsakh signed the Memorandum of Understanding between the Ministries of Foreign Affairs of two countries.
News_Shorts: Karen Mirzoyan, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Republic of Artsakh and Daur Kove , the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Artsakh on August 28.

News_Titles: The Abkhazian Foreign Ministry delegation arrives in Republic of Artsakh with the official visit
News_Shorts: The delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia headed by Daur Kove, the Foreign Minister has arrived in the Republic of Artsakh with the official visit today, on 27th of August . The delegation of the Abkhaz Foreign Ministry also included Irakli Tuzhba, the Assistant Foreign Minister and Adgur Chegia, the Head of the Strategic Cooperation Department.

News_Titles: On the Visit of the Delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia to South Ossetia.
News_Shorts: The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia took part in the events dedicated to the celebration of the Day of Recognition of the Independence of the Republic of South Ossetia by the Russian Federation.

News_Titles: On the meeting with Imad Khamis, the Chairman of the Council of Ministers of the Syrian Arab Republic.
News_Shorts: The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Imad Khamis, the Chairman of the Council of Ministers of the Syrian Arab Republic on August 21, 2017.

News_Titles: On the meeting of the delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia with Najat Anzur, the Chairman of the People's Council of Syria.
News_Shorts: The meeting of the delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia with Najat Anzur, the President of the Syrian National Council hosted at the People's Council of the Syrian Arab Republic, August 20, 2017.

News_Titles: On the meeting with Mohammed Samer Khalil, the Minister of Economy and Foreign Trade of Syria.
News_Shorts: Adgura Ardzinba, the Minister of Economy of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Mohammed Samer Khalil, the Minister of Economy and Foreign Trade of Syria in the Ministry of Economy and Foreign Trade of the Syrian Arab Republic on 17th of  August, 2017.

News_Titles: On the visit of the delegation Abkhazia to the Syrian Arab Republic
News_Shorts: From August 16 to 22, 2017, the delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia, headed by the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, Daur Kove, visited the Syrian Arab Republic.

News_Titles: On the meeting with Walid Al-Moallem, the Minister for Foreign Affairs of the Syrian Arab Republic.
News_Shorts: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Syrian Arab Republic hosted the meeting between Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia and Walid Al-Moallem, the Deputy Chairman of the Council of Ministers, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Syrian Arab Republic on August 17, 2017.

News_Titles: Daur Kove took part in the meeting of the expanded reporting collegium of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PMR
News_Shorts: Within the framework of the visit to Pridnestrovie Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia took part in the meeting of the expanded reporting collegium of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PMR, timed to the 25th anniversary of the formation of the foreign policy department.

News_Titles: Abkhazian-Russian consultations
News_Shorts: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation held regular consultations within the framework of the mechanism for foreign policy coordination of the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia and the Russian Foreign Ministry.

News_Titles: The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia took part in the celebrations dedicated to the Day of the Republic in the town of Donetsk
News_Shorts: The visit of the delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Donetsk People's Republic, headed by the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, Daur Kove, continues.

News_Titles: The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia left for the Donetsk People's Republic
News_Shorts: The delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia, led by the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, Daur Kove, left for the Donetsk People's Republic to participate in the events dedicated to the Republic Day.

News_Titles: Abkhazian Foreign Minister visited Gal district
News_Shorts: On March 19, the Foreign Minister Daur Kove paid a working visit to Gal district.

News_Titles: Visit of the delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela continues
News_Shorts: Within the framework of the visit the delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia, led by the Foreign Minister Daur Kove, held a meeting with the Minister of Foreign Trade and Investments of Venezuela, Jesús Faria.

News_Titles: The Delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia is on a working visit in Caracas
News_Shorts: The Abkhaz delegation headed by the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove includes Trade Representative of Abkhazia to Russia Oleg Bartsyts, Rector of the Abkhaz State University Aleko Gvaramia, Foreign Ministry officials Tengiz Tarba and Madina Zukhba.

News_Titles: The Delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia took part in the inauguration ceremony of the President of Nicaragua, Daniel Ortega
News_Shorts: The inauguration ceremony was held at the Revolution Square in Managua, capital of Nicaragua. Among the honored guests were the Presidents of Venezuela, Honduras and El Salvador, as well as heads of ministries and departments of other countries.

News_Titles: The Delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia arrived on an official visit to Nicaragua
News_Shorts: The Delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia arrived on an official visit to the Republic of Nicaragua to attend the inauguration ceremony of the President of Nicaragua, Daniel Ortega.

News_Titles: On the upcoming working visit of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove to Moscow
News_Shorts: At the invitation of the Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov, the Foreign Minister of Abkhazia Daur Kove is going to come to Moscow on a working visit on November 2-4.
